complications.name: Concussed
complications.description: The blow to the head leaves the target dazed and disoriented.

complications.name: Ringing Ears
complications.description: The impact causes the target's ears to ring painfully.

complications.name: Eye Injury
complications.description: The strike injures the target's eye, impairing vision.

complications.name: Shaken Will
complications.description: The brutal headshot rattles the target's resolve.

complications.name: Arm Injury
complications.description: The strike damages the target's arm, hindering attacks.

complications.name: Severed Tendons
complications.description: The slashing strike cuts tendons in the target's arm.

complications.name: Weakened Grip
complications.description: The strike weakens the target's grip strength.

complications.name: Hampered Movement
complications.description: The strike to the legs impairs movement.

complications.name: Hamstrung
complications.description: The strike damages leg muscles, severely hindering movement.

complications.name: Impaired Balance
complications.description: The leg injury affects the target's balance and agility.

complications.name: Winded
complications.description: The brutal impact to the torso knocks the wind from the target.

complications.name: Battered Ribs
complications.description: Broken or cracked ribs make physical exertion painful.

complications.name: Armor Breach
complications.description: The strike compromises the target's armor, leaving them vulnerable.

complications.name: Bleeding Wound
complications.description: The attack opens a grievous wound that continues to bleed.

complications.name: Burning Agony
complications.description: Flames continue to burn the target after the initial strike.

complications.name: Scorched Flesh
complications.description: Burns make physical movement painful and difficult.

complications.name: Burned Eyes
complications.description: Flames sear the target's eyes, impairing vision.

complications.name: Frostbite
complications.description: Freezing energy continues to damage frozen flesh.

complications.name: Frozen Limbs
complications.description: Bitter cold freezes the target's limbs, slowing movement.

complications.name: Numbed Fingers
complications.description: Freezing cold numbs the target's fingers, hampering dexterity.

complications.name: Muscle Lock
complications.description: Electricity locks up the target's muscles momentarily.

complications.name: Spasming Limbs
complications.description: Residual electricity causes involuntary muscle spasms.

complications.name: Shocked Nerves
complications.description: Electric shock disrupts the target's nervous system.

complications.name: Acid Burns
complications.description: Corrosive acid continues to eat away at the target's flesh.

complications.name: Corroded Armor
complications.description: Acid eats through the target's armor, leaving them vulnerable.

complications.name: Acid Pain
complications.description: Acid burns cause excruciating pain, hampering concentration.

complications.name: Deafened
complications.description: The sonic assault leaves the target temporarily unable to hear.

complications.name: Disoriented
complications.description: Thunderous sound disorients the target.

complications.name: Nauseous
complications.description: Resonating vibrations upset the target's internal organs.

complications.name: Poisoned
complications.description: Toxins continue to course through the target's bloodstream.

complications.name: Toxic Weakness
complications.description: Poison weakens the target's constitution.

complications.name: Mental Fog
complications.description: Psychic assault clouds the target's mind.

complications.name: Arcane Confusion
complications.description: The mental attack disrupts magical understanding.

complications.name: Occult Disruption
complications.description: Psychic damage disrupts occult knowledge.

complications.name: Life Drain
complications.description: Void energy saps the target's life force.

complications.name: Withered
complications.description: Negative energy withers the target's muscles.

complications.name: Sapped Will
complications.description: Void energy drains mental fortitude.

complications.name: Light Burned
complications.description: Positive energy burns painfully through unnatural flesh.

complications.name: Force Impact
complications.description: Pure force batters the target's defenses.

complications.name: Force Rattled
complications.description: The force blast leaves the target shaken.

complications.name: Spiritual Weakness
complications.description: The spiritual attack undermines the target's resolve.

complications.name: Soul Shaken
complications.description: The spirit attack disrupts religious knowledge.

complications.name: Wing Tear
complications.description: The strike tears through delicate wing membrane.

complications.name: Tail Injury
complications.description: The strike damages the target's tail, affecting balance.

complications.name: Splintered Wood
complications.description: The attack splinters the plant creature's woody structure.

complications.name: Sap Leak
complications.description: The wound causes the plant creature to leak vital sap.

complications.name: Damaged Roots
complications.description: The strike damages the creature's root structure, impairing mobility.

complications.name: Wilted Leaves
complications.description: Fire or frost causes the plant's leaves to wilt, reducing awareness.

complications.name: Cracked Bark Armor
complications.description: The impact cracks the protective bark, leaving vulnerabilities.

complications.name: Damaged Photosynthesis
complications.description: The attack damages the plant's ability to gather energy from light.

complications.name: Seized Mechanisms
complications.description: The impact jams the construct's internal mechanisms.

complications.name: Loose Joints
complications.description: The strike loosens critical joints, impairing precision.

complications.name: Damaged Plating
complications.description: The attack dents or tears the construct's protective plating.

complications.name: Power Leak
complications.description: The strike damages the construct's power source, causing energy to leak.

complications.name: Frayed Control Cables
complications.description: The attack frays internal control cables, reducing coordination.

complications.name: Overheated Core
complications.description: The attack causes the construct's core to overheat.

complications.name: Dispersed Form
complications.description: The attack disperses part of the elemental's essence.

complications.name: Destabilized Essence
complications.description: The strike destabilizes the elemental's core essence.

complications.name: Weakened Manifestation
complications.description: The elemental's physical form flickers and weakens.

complications.name: Elemental Imbalance
complications.description: The attack disrupts the elemental's natural balance.

complications.name: Fractured Membrane
complications.description: The strike fractures the ooze's outer membrane.

complications.name: Split Cytoplasm
complications.description: The attack splits the ooze's cytoplasm, causing mass to leak out.

complications.name: Reduced Viscosity
complications.description: Cold or acid reduces the ooze's viscosity and cohesion.

complications.name: Damaged Organelle
complications.description: The precise strike damages a critical internal organelle.

complications.name: Rotting Flesh Exposed
complications.description: The blow tears away chunks of rotting flesh, exposing decayed tissue beneath.

complications.name: Limb Dangling
complications.description: The strike partially severs a limb, leaving it hanging by sinews and rotted tissue.

complications.name: Jaw Unhinged
complications.description: The powerful blow dislocates the zombie's jaw, causing it to hang loosely.

complications.name: Maggot-Infested Wound
complications.description: The strike opens a foul wound teeming with maggots and decay.

complications.name: Shattered Ribs
complications.description: The impact shatters several ribs, causing bone fragments to scatter.

complications.name: Cracked Skull
complications.description: A devastating blow cracks the skeleton's skull, causing the jaw to hang askew.

complications.name: Splintered Bones
complications.description: The strike splinters bones in the limb, weakening the skeletal structure.

complications.name: Loosened Joints
complications.description: The attack loosens the skeletal joints, causing bones to rattle and shift.

complications.name: Scale Breach
complications.description: The attack penetrates between scales, finding vulnerable flesh beneath the armored hide.

complications.name: Shattered Scales
complications.description: The powerful blow shatters several protective scales, leaving exposed flesh.

complications.name: Wing Membrane Tear
complications.description: The strike tears the delicate wing membrane, impairing flight capability.

complications.name: Breath Weapon Disruption
complications.description: The blow strikes the throat or chest, temporarily disrupting breath weapon capability.

complications.name: Cracked Horn
complications.description: The impact cracks one of the dragon's majestic horns.

complications.name: Tentacle Damage
complications.description: The strike damages one of the creature's grasping tentacles, reducing its ability to manipulate objects.

complications.name: Eye Stalk Injury
complications.description: The attack strikes an eye stalk, causing it to droop and impair vision.

complications.name: Alien Ichor Leak
complications.description: The wound leaks strange, otherworldly ichor that saps the creature's vitality.

complications.name: Psychic Feedback
complications.description: The injury causes psychic feedback that disrupts the aberration's mental focus.

complications.name: Broken Fang
complications.description: The strike shatters one of the beast's fangs, reducing bite effectiveness.

complications.name: Torn Muscle
complications.description: The attack tears powerful muscles, reducing the beast's physical prowess.

complications.name: Injured Paw
complications.description: The strike damages a paw or claw, causing the beast to limp.

complications.name: Glamour Disrupted
complications.description: The blow disrupts the fey's natural glamour, making them appear less enchanting.

complications.name: Fey Essence Leak
complications.description: The wound causes shimmering fey essence to leak out, weakening magical abilities.

complications.name: Broken Fey Wing
complications.description: The attack damages delicate fey wings, impairing flight and grace.

complications.name: Ruptured Organ
complications.description: The devastating blow ruptures an internal organ, causing severe internal damage.

complications.name: Fractured Bone
complications.description: The impact fractures bone, causing excruciating pain with every movement.

complications.name: Nerve Damage
complications.description: The precise strike damages nerves, causing numbness and loss of fine motor control.

complications.name: Dislocated Joint
complications.description: The wrenching impact dislocates a major joint, severely limiting mobility.

complications.name: Punctured Lung
complications.description: The piercing attack punctures a lung, causing gasping breaths and weakness.

complications.name: Spinal Impact
complications.description: The blow strikes the spine, sending shocking pain throughout the body.

complications.name: Arterial Nick
complications.description: The blade nicks an artery, causing profuse bleeding that's difficult to staunch.

complications.name: Crushed Hand
complications.description: The crushing blow mangles the hand, making it nearly useless for delicate tasks.
